This was mentioned to the Messenger of Allah (peace and blessings be upon him), and he said: 'Is she going to detain us?' She (Aisha) said: 'So I said: O Messenger of Allah, she has already performed the tawaf of ifadah and made tawaf around the House, then she menstruated after the ifadah.' She said: 'So the Messenger of Allah (peace and blessings be upon him) said: Then let her depart.'"
